be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models

Class GeometryDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.models.GeometryDAO

  • public class GeometryDAO
extends java.util.Observable
    Author:
    Titouan Christophe, Walter Moulart The geometry class is a DAO for all geometry related models. Handle CRUD operations, and the associations logic

    • Constructor Summary

      GeometryDAO(ConnectionSource database)

                   double bound)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        p - The point from which we search a neighbor
